Html:
Hi,

--------------------------------------------------------------------

If (buttoncontent=”a”)

{

            If (buttoncontent=”b”) !! (vara=varb)

            {

                        Button visibility=visible

            }

How can write this multitrigger condition? Pelase help me very urgent.

 

Thanks in advance
